headline: Assessing Pentair (PNR) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Why Pentair (PNR) Is On Investors’ Radar Today Pentair (PNR) is back in focus after a recent pullback, with the share price sitting at $99.19 and posting negative returns over the past week, month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Pentair. While the recent 1 month share price return of a 5.87% decline leaves Pentair below its year to date level, the 1 year total shareholder return of 6.38% and 3 year total shareholder return of 81.85% point to a much stronger longer term...
